The sea-lavv of Scotland shortly gathered and plainly dressit for the reddy vse of all seafairingmen. Welwood, William, fl. 1578-1622.
[34] p.
Imprinted by Robert Waldegraue, At Edinburgh : An. Dom. 1590.
Dedication signed: William Welwod. Signatures: [A]⁴ (-[A]4, blank?) B C⁶. Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
